Reviews.Title: “Lovely staff made our stay”

Reviews.Content: friend stayed hotel recently arrived tired little grumpy greeted friendly smile receptionist walked door oh girls phoned ready immediately feel welcome loaned hotels laptop access wifi godsend clean simple comfortable complimentary apples knife nice touch morning easter sunday delighted chocolate bunny sitting outside door breakfast buffet delicious boiled eggs smoked salmon cold meats museli yoghurt pastries receptionist breakfast waitress smiley leave straight breakfast short stay receptionist happily phoned taxi highly recommend hotel
